verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) I Will lift <S%H5375><s%> up my eyes <S%H5869><s%> to the mountains; <S%H2022><s%> From whence <S%H370><s%> shall my help <S%H5828><s%> come <S%H935><s%>?
My help <S%H5828><s%> [comes] from the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Who made <S%H6213><s%> heaven <S%H8064><s%> and earth. <S%H776><s%>
He will not allow <S%H5414><s%> your foot <S%H7272><s%> to slip; <S%H4131><s%> He who keeps <S%H8104><s%> you will not slumber. <S%H5123><s%>
Behold, <S%H2009><s%> He who keeps <S%H8104><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> Will neither <S%H3808><s%> slumber <S%H5123><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> sleep. <S%H3462><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is your keeper; <S%H8104><s%> The Lord <S%H3068><s%> is your shade <S%H6738><s%> on your right <S%H3225><s%> hand. <S%H3027><s%>
The sun <S%H8121><s%> will not smite <S%H5221><s%> you by day, <S%H3119><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> the moon <S%H3394><s%> by night. <S%H3915><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will protect <S%H8104><s%> you from all <S%H3605><s%> evil; <S%H9563><s%> He will keep <S%H8104><s%> your soul. <S%H5315><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> will guard <S%H8104><s%> your going <S%H3318><s%> out and your coming <S%H935><s%> in From this <S%H6258><s%> time <S%H6258><s%> forth and forever. <S%H5704><s%> <S%H5769><s%>
